text: Kyzyl-Yar () is a rural locality (a selo) in Kyzyl-Yarsky Selsoviet, Yermekeyevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 72 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 19 km from Yermekeyevo, 5 km from Suyemetovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Yermekeyevsky District
title: Kyzyl-Yar, Yermekeyevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
